original_text: Righteous people continue to do things that are right. People who do good things become stronger. Righteous people continue to do things that are right.
korean_text: 그러므로 의인은 그 길을 꾸준히 가고 손이 깨끗한 자는 점점 힘을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: Righteous people continue to do things that are right.
People who do good things become stronger.
sentences.korean_translation: 좋은 일을 하는 사람들은 더 강해집니다.

sentences.original_text: Righteous people continue to do things that are right.
